extends java.lang.Object

      • MenuView

                java.awt.event.ActionListener quitListener,

        MenuView constructor.
        Parameters:
        createPlayerListener - listener for createPlayer button
        quitListener - listener for quitGame button
        startListener - listener for start button

    • Method Detail

      • getSelectedPlayer

        public java.lang.String getSelectedPlayer()
        Gets player selected by user.
        Returns:
        returns false if no player was selected or if list is empty.

      • getSelectedLevel

        public java.lang.String getSelectedLevel()
        Gets level selected by user.
        Returns:
        returns false if no player was selected or if list is empty.

      • initJlists

        public void initJlists()
        Loads GUI lists of levels, players and loads and sorts scoreboard.

      • setMainWindow

        public void setMainWindow()
        Sets and displays main window. After calling this method user can start interaction with the app.

      • createWarningPopup

        public void createWarningPopup​(java.lang.String message,
                               java.lang.String title)
        Creates warning popup with custom message and title.

      • createExitDialog

        public int createExitDialog()
        Creates dialog exit dialog.
        Returns:
        return value 0 means user clicked EXIT GAME, all other values mean return to main menu

      • createPlayerCreationDialog

        public java.lang.String createPlayerCreationDialog()
        Creates input dialog to enter player name.
        Returns:
        if nothing or only whitespaces are entered, returns null.

      • createInfoMsg

        public void createInfoMsg​(java.lang.String info)
        Creates information popup with custom message.

      • setVisibility

        public void setVisibility​(boolean vis)
        Sets MainMenu visibility. If menu is made visible revalidate() is called.
